levels.description:
Attack range <@ba.vup>expands</> and ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Immediately defeats enemies in range with HP below <@ba.vup>{attack@kill_atk_scale:0%}</> of Logos's ATK, and deals Arts damage equal to the HP of the defeated unit to another random target.
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
